effect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Vikavolt or Vikavolt-GX as a Special Energy card. This card provides 2 Lightning Energy only while it’s attached to a Pokémon.
effect.fr: L’attacher à Lucanon ou Lucanon-GX comme carte Énergie spéciale.
effect.es: Une a Vikavolt o Vikavolt-GX como una carta de Energía Especial.
effect.it: Assegna a Vikavolt o Vikavolt-GX come carta Energia speciale.
effect.pt: Ligar a Vikavolt ou Vikavolt-GX como uma carta de Energia Especial.
effect.de: Lege sie als Spezial-Energiekarte an Donarion oder Donarion-GX an.
